description:
If you’re in a waste-managed zone or planning more than one day on the rock, consider packing one of these waste containers. This bag-within-a bag design is a wilderness throne that safely contains waste and keeps foul odours at bay, making the slight addition of weight totally worth while.

  • Outer bag is a Mylar® gas-impervious bag
  • Can be used with commode system or directly on ground
  • Includes toilet paper and a pleasantly moist antiseptic towelette
name: Restop II Disposable Bag For Solid Waste
